main event: A civilian in Gonzales, Texas spotted a shiny, disc-like object descending rapidly towards him in 1952. The object slowed down and hovered about 150 feet off the ground, then accelerated and dashed out of sight at high speed.
interesting points: The object had a flashing light on it.
The object was described as very thin in proportion and made of a shiny material.
No sound or means of propulsion was noted.
The witness was standing outside when he sighted the object.
The sighting lasted for a short period of time before the object rapidly accelerated and disappeared.
